attributes.action: remove the speed limit on all uk Motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this may sound dangerous but if the speed limit is not totaly remved then why not make it a bit higher. 
it's work in germany on the autobahn's.
half of them don't have a speed limit. lust an advisory one. (so if u crash going faster then the advisory speed limit it's your fault)
